Datastructures.Statistics

Class CentralProcessorStatistics

  • java.lang.Object
    • Datastructures.Statistics.Statistic
      • Datastructures.Statistics.DataStatistics
        • Datastructures.Statistics.CentralProcessorStatistics

  • public class CentralProcessorStatistics
extends DataStatistics
    This class extends the DataStatistic with information received by the central processor.
    Since the CentralProcessor takes over all clauses from the PreProcessor, it also takes over the observers which fill the DataStatistic part of the statistics.
    Created by ohlbach on 17.10.2018.
